pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Reading, Processing and Writing 'DSSAT' Files // Provides methods for reading, displaying, processing and writing files originally arranged for the 'DSSAT-CSM' fixed width format. The 'DSSAT-CSM' cropping system model is described at J.W. Jones, G. Hoogenboomb, C.H. Porter, K.J. Boote, W.D. Batchelor, L.A. Hunt, P.W. Wilkens, U. Singh, A.J. Gijsman, J.T. Ritchie (2003) doi:10.1016/S1161-0301(02)00107-7.
